description: This animated made-for-TV movie, based on MTV's hit "Daria," explores the summer vacation of Daria and her classmates at Lawndale High.
keywords: teenager,girl wears eyeglasses,black comedy,dark comedy,teen movie
name: Daria in 'Is It Fall Yet?'

original_info.id: Daria: The Movie: Is it Fall Yet?_2001
original_info.name: Daria: The Movie: Is it Fall Yet?

review.name: America's sweetheart is back!!
review.reviewBody: No one but the Daria crew could touch real life like this In the movie, Daria and company spend an all too short summer break dealing with life. Daria, Quinn, and Jane in particular must re-evaluate their lives and relationships. What they find is the true nature of themselves and those who touch their lives. Daria and Jane find the depth of their friendship. Daria adjusts to dating. And Quinn realizes the neglect of her mind and her true feelings. All this without getting sappy once! Oh yes, and it's really funny too. This is a four star flick that's not to be missed.
